description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) They are coming for your brains...time to Lock and Load. This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2 - 4, Local Multiplayer 2 - 4, HD (High Definition).  Unlock the full version of Zombie Apocalypse and experience the brutal carnage of this action packed, blood soaked shooter!  Burn, Saw, and Dismember your way through the horrifying infestation during 7 challenging game modes while attempting to survive 55 stages of brutal carnage over 7 brain-splattering HD locations!  Rip thru zombie hordes with 10 devastating weapons while unlocking Achievements anâ€¦
